name: HurryBob - Use your Time!
description:
Hey Gamer, thank you for playing and testing my secound ever Game!

 I have made a pretty cool game for the Unreal Engine Summer Jam 2018 and this is the official Itch.io Site of it. #ue4jam

I belong to the category "One Man Army" and had to make this game in just 4-5 Days so i hope you dont expect a battlefield or GTA 6 or something :D

Credit goes to all the creative people who made these amazing soundeffects which i used in my game. They are all from www.freesound.org and they are amazing!

Also i want to thank the Epic Games Team, because without the Unreal Engine it would be impossible for me to create games like this so easily.
And i want to thank the producer of this sick remix of SOLO by Demi Lovato and Clean Bendit which i used in the trailer  .. you are amazing man!
Here is the Link to the official remix:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cQguy...

At last i want to thank Virtus for his amazing tutorials .. I have learned everything from you man ! Keep up the good work!

Virtus: https://www.youtube.com/user/VirtusEdu

| The official Game Trailer |

The controls are simple:

W,A,S,D are the main keys you have to use to walk around the world

With E you can interact with the door!

The difficulty in the Game is quiet hard because the door to the Game opens in a random time but that is the entertaining part about it i guess :D

There is an extra (Easter Eqq) hidden in the Game, which i hope you will find very entertaining! 

If you have any Comments, Recommendations or any Feedback just write me an EMAIL to:       -----     Alpaykucuk@outlook.de      -----

| HERE ARE SOME ACTUAL GAME FOOTAGE |

| HOW TO INSTALL |

1.) extract Game Files from QoopliTe_Hurrybob.rar 

2.) start playing the Game by clicking the "Hurry Bob - The Game" application! *

3.) if you want the game on your Desktop, DO NOT move the original Application File! make a shortcut instead move the shortcut to your Desktop!

Pre-Made things i only made use of and not created in these 4-5 days are:

- All the soundeffects except of the "Welcome to the HurryBob Game" tape in the beginning of every game .. thats actually my voice :)

- the Character and the animations are pre made by Adobes mixamo.com library! (i just added the animaitions to the character )

- the foliages and the trees are pre made .. i have them from you official Infinity Blade Grass Lands collection from the Marketplace

- anything such as the game dymnamics and the processes are implemented by myself during the jam session!  also the buildings and the furnitures are made by myself.
